padcms.kiosk.view.grid

Class GridViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • GridView
      • padcms.kiosk.view.grid.GridViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BasicViewController

    public class GridViewController
extends GridView
implements BasicViewController
    Object of GridViewController provides the interaction elements of the interface with the threads of user tasks. Elements of View are arranged in the form of a GridView.

      void setVisibleStateCancelDownload()
      Sets text on firstButton "Cancel", secondButton invisible, restores progress on progressBar and sets stateTxt visible and text on stateTxt "Dowloading...".

      Sets text on firstButton "Cancel", secondButton invisible, restores progress on progressBar and sets stateTxt visible and text on stateTxt "Installation...".
      void setVisibleStateReadyToDownloading()
      Sets text on firstButton "Open", sets secondButton visible, sets stateTxt and progressBar invisible.
      void setVisibleStateReadyToDownloading(Issue issue)
      Sets text on firstButton "Download" and background for it, sets secondButton, stateTxt and probressBar invisible, reset progressBar.
      void setVisibleStateReadyToInstall()
      Sets text on firstButton "Install", secondButton invisible, sets progressBar(and reset it) and stateTxt invisible.
      void setVisibleStateReadyToOpening()
      Sets text on firstButton "Open", sets secondButton visible, sets stateTxt and progressBar invisible.
      void updateProgressWith(long current)
      Updates progressBar and text describing it in percents.
